problem_names: theorem F'map_id: "F'map id id id = id"
theorem F'map_comp: "F'map (f1 o g1) (f2 o g2) (f3 o g3) = F'map f1 f2 f3 o F'map g1 g2 g3"

theorem F'map_cong: "\<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F'set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z = g1 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F'set2 x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z = g2 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F'set3 x \<Longrightarrow> f3 z = g3 z\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> F'map f1 f2 f3 x = F'map g1 g2 g3 x"
theorem F'set1_natural: "F'set1 o F'map f1 f2 f3 = image f1 o F'set1"
theorem F'set2_natural: "F'set2 o F'map f1 f2 f3 = image f2 o F'set2"
theorem F'set3_natural: "F'set3 o F'map f1 f2 f3 = image f3 o F'set3"
lemma F'in_alt: "F'in A1 A2 A3 = Fin A3 A1 A2"
lemmas F'rel_unfold = trans[OF F'rel_def trans[OF OO_Grp_cong[OF F'in_alt] sym[OF F.rel_compp_Grp]]]
translations: theorem F'map_id: "F'map id id id = id"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'map id id id = id
theorem F'map_comp: "F'map (f1 o g1) (f2 o g2) (f3 o g3) = F'map f1 f2 f3 o F'map g1 g2 g3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'map (f1 \<circ> g1) (f2 \<circ> g2) (f3 \<circ> g3) =
    F'map f1 f2 f3 \<circ> F'map g1 g2 g3

theorem F'map_cong: "\<lbrakk>\<And>z. z \<in> F'set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z = g1 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F'set2 x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z = g2 z; \<And>z. z \<in> F'set3 x \<Longrightarrow> f3 z = g3 z\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> F'map f1 f2 f3 x = F'map g1 g2 g3 x"
theorem F'set1_natural: "F'set1 o F'map f1 f2 f3 = image f1 o F'set1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'set1 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3 = (`) f1 \<circ> F'set1
theorem F'set2_natural: "F'set2 o F'map f1 f2 f3 = image f2 o F'set2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'set2 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3 = (`) f2 \<circ> F'set2
theorem F'set3_natural: "F'set3 o F'map f1 f2 f3 = image f3 o F'set3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'set3 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3 = (`) f3 \<circ> F'set3

abbreviation F'in :: "'a1 set \<Rightarrow> 'a2 set \<Rightarrow> 'a3 set \<Rightarrow> (('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3) F') set" where
  "F'in A1 A2 A3 \<equiv> {x. F'set1 x \<subseteq> A1 \<and> F'set2 x \<subseteq> A2 \<and> F'set3 x \<subseteq> A3}"
lemma F'in_alt: "F'in A1 A2 A3 = Fin A3 A1 A2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F'in A1 A2 A3 =
    {x. F'set3 x \<subseteq> A3 \<and>
        F'set1 x \<subseteq> A1 \<and> F'set2 x \<subseteq> A2}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       (F'set1 x \<subseteq> A1 \<and>
        F'set2 x \<subseteq> A2 \<and> F'set3 x \<subseteq> A3) =
       (F'set3 x \<subseteq> A3 \<and>
        F'set1 x \<subseteq> A1 \<and> F'set2 x \<subseteq> A2)

definition F'rel where
  "F'rel R1 R2 R3 = (BNF_Def.Grp (F'in (Collect (case_prod R1)) (Collect (case_prod R2)) (Collect (case_prod R3))) (F'map fst fst fst))^--1 OO
                 (BNF_Def.Grp (F'in (Collect (case_prod R1)) (Collect (case_prod R2)) (Collect (case_prod R3))) (F'map snd snd snd))"
lemmas F'rel_unfold = trans[OF F'rel_def trans[OF OO_Grp_cong[OF F'in_alt] sym[OF F.rel_compp_Grp]]]

bnf F': "('p, 'a1, 'a2, 'a3) F'"
  map: F'map
  sets: F'set1 F'set2 F'set3
  bd: "F'bd :: 'p bd_type_F rel"
  rel: F'rel

proof (prove)
goal (13 subgoals):
 1. F'map id id id = id
 2. \<And>f1 f2 f3 g1 g2 g3.
       F'map (g1 \<circ> f1) (g2 \<circ> f2) (g3 \<circ> f3) =
       F'map g1 g2 g3 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3
 3. \<And>x f1 f2 f3 g1 g2 g3.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>z1. z1 \<in> F'set1 x \<Longrightarrow> f1 z1 = g1 z1;
        \<And>z2. z2 \<in> F'set2 x \<Longrightarrow> f2 z2 = g2 z2;
        \<And>z3. z3 \<in> F'set3 x \<Longrightarrow> f3 z3 = g3 z3\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> F'map f1 f2 f3 x = F'map g1 g2 g3 x
 4. \<And>f1 f2 f3. F'set1 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3 = (`) f1 \<circ> F'set1
 5. \<And>f1 f2 f3. F'set2 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3 = (`) f2 \<circ> F'set2
 6. \<And>f1 f2 f3. F'set3 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3 = (`) f3 \<circ> F'set3
 7. card_order F'bd
 8. cinfinite F'bd
 9. \<And>x. |F'set1 x| \<le>o F'bd
 10. \<And>x. |F'set2 x| \<le>o F'bd
A total of 13 subgoals...

 2. \<And>f1 f2 f3. F'set2 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3 = (`) f2 \<circ> F'set2
 3. \<And>f1 f2 f3. F'set3 \<circ> F'map f1 f2 f3 = (`) f3 \<circ> F'set3
 4. card_order F'bd
 5. cinfinite F'bd
 6. \<And>x. |F'set1 x| \<le>o F'bd
 7. \<And>x. |F'set2 x| \<le>o F'bd
 8. \<And>x. |F'set3 x| \<le>o F'bd
 9. \<And>R1 R2 R3 S1 S2 S3.
       F'rel R1 R2 R3 OO F'rel S1 S2 S3
       \<le> F'rel (R1 OO S1) (R2 OO S2) (R3 OO S3)
 10. \<And>R1 R2 R3.
        F'rel R1 R2 R3 =
        (\<lambda>x y.
            \<exists>z.
               (F'set1 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R1 x y} \<and>
                F'set2 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R2 x y} \<and>
                F'set3 z \<subseteq> {(x, y). R3 x y}) \<and>
               F'map fst fst fst z = x \<and> F'map snd snd snd z = y)
